title: Sandbar Puts AI on Your Finger
description: AI wearables have promised a lot — and mostly disappointed. Sandbar’s CEO says this time is different. Mina Fahmi joins us on the Stream Ring, a voice-first AI wearable designed to capture ideas effortlessly — and why the future of AI may finally move beyond the screen. (Source: Bloomberg)
